A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Force Awakens was a shameless remake of A New Hope. 

Rogue One was A New Hope: The Opening Crawl.

The Last Jedi is Empire Strikes Back: The Opening Crawl.

The Rebels evacuate their base after destroying the death star. They seek refuge on a remote icy planet. Where they are attacked by giant armored transports forcing them to flee again.

I'm genuinely excited to see Episode 9: The Return of the Ewoks.
